title: Soul Reaver Talon.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello. Am I the only one who thinks that Talon deserve a new skin? After the Blood Moon Talon, nothing else about Talon. I think he should get some love from Riot, just take a look at the photo. The skin is extremely beautiful. What do you think guys? I main Talon and my opinion is that he deserve this skin.
Come on Riot, show my boy some love.

replies.body:
I mean, other champs need skins more, but I would buy that in a heartbeat.

Personally, I think he needs a heartseeker skin.  

{{champion:91}} "Eventually, my blades will find their way into your heart."
Yea haha i got it!! Yea, i know other champs need skins more, but honestly that skin is awesome and it should be released in a couple of months.. Or weeks xD.
Haven't seen that skin concept in years. Still getting floated around. It's starting to look like it belongs on the program skin line
that could definitely turn out amazing, at least I'd insta buy lol
Without new animations for them, the things on his back would look really awkward imo. Probably needs to be 1820, or it could be remodeled a little bit.
